name: Bird Run
description:
REQUIREMENTS

Suggested requirements: 

OS: Windows
CPU: 2.8ghz
Video Card: GTX 960

THIS GAME REQUIRES A WINDOWS COMPATIBLE GAME CONTROLLER TO PLAY.
Any game controller should work, however all in-game prompts / button tips are in the format of Xbox controller buttons. 

IS THIS GAME FINISHED? CURRENTLY THE GAME INCLUDES;

* 1x large beautiful east Asian inspired map

* 3x mini-games

* Roughly 30 minute average play session duration

* Replay-ability

KNOWN TO BE COMING;

* At least 3x more mini-games (minimum)

LIKELY TO BE ADDED:

* 1x alternate board route, moving through un-visited sections of the already included large map.

* More mini-games

POSSIBLY ADDED (ESPECIALLY IF PURCHASE GOALS ARE REACHED);

* 1x new map with new unique theme

TECHNICAL HELP

Report any issues to voodoo-bird-games@outlook.com

The game has a built in debug key which can help if a turn is frozen and does not progress to the next move/player. 

Press the END key to prompt the game to check which player is current and to initiate their roll sequence.
